dialogue.content: I started running again and my shins hurt.
Did it come on suddenly, or build up over a week or two?
It built up. I increased my runs pretty quickly.
Got it. How many days per week are you running right now?
Four days. I jumped from zero to that.
Okay. Do you want a plan to keep running or are you open to a short break?
I want to keep running if possible, just smarter.
Understood. We'll focus on load management and recovery.
If I could keep training without the shin pain getting worse, that's all I want.
